## Damage detection

### 2D structure (Rao et al., 2004)

![Case 1](http://vireax.github.io/vibration/fig201403/truss1.png)

11 elements, 6 nodes

- Case 1: undamaged
- Case 2: partial damage
- Case 3: missing 1 element from the structure
